pages.title: WEP (Wired Equivalent Privacy)

pages.title: WPA (WiFi Protected Access)
pages.content:
WPA, WEP'in gÃ¼venlik aÃ§Ä±klarÄ±nÄ± gidermek iÃ§in geliÅŸtirilmiÅŸtir.

ğŸ›¡ï¸ **WPA GÃ¼venlik Ä°yileÅŸtirmeleri:**

â€¢ **Authentication:**

pages.title: WPA2 (WiFi Protected Access 2)
pages.content:
WPA2, gÃ¼nÃ¼mÃ¼zde en yaygÄ±n kullanÄ±lan WiFi gÃ¼venlik standardÄ±dÄ±r.

ğŸ”’ **WPA2 Ã–zellikleri:**
â€¢ AES (Advanced Encryption Standard)

ğŸ›¡ï¸ **WPA2 GÃ¼venlik KatmanlarÄ±:**

â€¢ **CCMP Protocol:**
  - Counter mode
  - CBC-MAC authentication
  - Data integrity
  - Replay protection

â€¢ **Key Management:**
  - 4-way handshake
  - PMK (Pairwise Master Key)
  - PTK (Pairwise Transient Key)

ğŸ” **WPA2 Authentication:**
â€¢ **WPA2-PSK:**

âš ï¸ **WPA2 GÃ¼venlik AÃ§Ä±klarÄ±:**
â€¢ **KRACK Attack (2017):**
  - Key reinstallation attack
  - 4-way handshake exploit
  - Client-side vulnerability

â€¢ **PSK Vulnerabilities:**
  - Weak passphrases
  - Dictionary attacks
  - Brute force attacks
  - Social engineering

ğŸ› ï¸ **WPA2 SaldÄ±rÄ± AraÃ§larÄ±:**

ğŸ“Š **WPA2 Durumu:**

pages.title: WPA/WPA2 Handshake Yakalama
pages.content:
WPA/WPA2 handshake yakalama, ÅŸifre kÄ±rma sÃ¼recinin ilk ve en kritik adÄ±mÄ±dÄ±r.

ğŸ¤ **4-Way Handshake SÃ¼reci:**
1. **Message 1:** AP â†’ Client (ANonce)
2. **Message 2:** Client â†’ AP (SNonce + MIC)

pages.title: Dictionary Attack YÃ¶ntemleri
pages.content:
Dictionary attack, yaygÄ±n ÅŸifrelerin listesini kullanarak WPA/WPA2 ÅŸifrelerini kÄ±rmaya Ã§alÄ±ÅŸÄ±r.

ğŸ“š **Dictionary Attack Nedir?**

pages.content:
Brute force saldÄ±rÄ±larÄ±, tÃ¼m olasÄ± ÅŸifre kombinasyonlarÄ±nÄ± deneyerek WPA/WPA2 ÅŸifrelerini kÄ±rmaya Ã§alÄ±ÅŸÄ±r.
